mapper.select: select ID,TRAIN_RES,WSSSE,PERFORMANCE from T_KMEANS_INDEX T 1=1 and T.FILE_ID = #{condition.fileId} and T.TRAIN_MODEL like '%/${condition.modelNo}'

select CLUSTER_ID,CENTER from T_KMEANS_CENTERS T
T.KMEANS_ID = #{kmeansId}

select T.FILE_NAME AS fileName, T.SCENE AS sceneId, S.NAME AS sceneName from T_TRAIN_DATA T LEFT JOIN T_SCENE S ON S.ID=T.SCENE
T.ID = #{fileId}

select SUBSTR(TRAIN_MODEL,-22) AS MODELNO from T_KMEANS_INDEX T
T.FILE_ID = #{fileId}
select ID from T_PRODUCE_MODEL T where T.MODEL_TYPE=#{condition.modelType} and T.SCENE=#{condition.sceneId}
